name: Sandmade
description: Look closely and imagine, do those structures fit together? Sandmade is a beautiful puzzle game that starts simple and relaxing but will soon challenge your brain and test your spatial skills. How good are you at visualising objects in your mind? Immerse yourself in the world of sand shapes and find out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB memory Storage: 100 MB available space
